formatted_address: 65 Airport Boulevard, #02-27, Changi Airport, Terminal 3 Departure Transit Lounge South, Singapore 819663
name: The Cocoa Trees - Changi Airport Terminal 3 South

reviews.text:
The chocolate shops located within Changi Airport Terminal 3’s airside area are a paradise for candy and chocolate lovers, offering an impressive selection that caters to all tastes and preferences. These shops are a fantastic destination for travelers looking to pick up last-minute gifts or indulge in a sweet treat before their flight.

The variety available is remarkable, ranging from premium international brands to locally made delicacies, ensuring there’s something for everyone. Whether you’re a fan of artisanal chocolates, creamy truffles, or nostalgic candy classics, these stores have you covered. Many of the items come in beautifully designed packaging, making them ideal as souvenirs or thoughtful gifts for loved ones.

I would like to express my deepest gratitude to the entire staff for the exceptional service I received. I was extremely impressed by your patience and dedication in helping me find information about the Halal status of each chocolate product I purchased. Your friendly and informative service truly made my shopping experience very pleasant.

Thank you very much for your assistance. I greatly appreciate the effort and attention you have provided.

Has lots of chocolate at lower prices.
Staff was very friendly and professional
Recommending  anyone to go this shop  and buy the chocolate for your loved once.
Not much experience compared to other shops. Quite similar to Mustafa centre.
Also the borh staff was on 19th September were brilliant than other Singapore staff in d Airport.

Not my personal favourite choice of gift shopping, but it works. Chocolates, snacks, and gifts that are uniquely Singapore. The prices are generally on the higher side, but if you're departing Singapore and need to get some gifts, this shop may be your life saver. This outlet is located at Terminal 3, departure hall, right after you enter the immigration gantries.
Be careful with expiry dates, products with higher discounts have immediate expiry...horrible experience

vicinity: 65 Airport Boulevard, #02-27, Changi Airport, Terminal 3 Departure Transit Lounge South
